invalidateVouching(address[],address[]).details: Invalidates the vouching for a solver by a bonding pool Anyone can call this function, but only the events where the sender is the owner of the referenced bondingPool will be officially indexed The owner of a bonding pool is identified by the address sending the full initial funding to the bonding pool

params.bondingPool: Address of the official bonding pool, from which a potential loss will no longer be covered
params.solver: The solver for whom the bonding pool will no longer cover any losses/penalities

vouch(address[],address[],address[]).details: Allows a bonding pool to officially vouch for a solver Anyone can call this function, but only the events where the sender is the owner of the referenced bondingPool will be officially indexed The owner of a bonding pool is identified by the address sending the full initial funding to the bonding pool

params.bondingPool: Address of the bonding pool from which a potential loss will be covered
params.cowRewardTarget: Address to which the solver COW Token reward should be send for the particular solver
params.solver: The solver for whom the bonding pool will cover potential losses/penalities
